title: Telemedicine Collaboration Design and Practice-Based Learning Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Terminology and Understanding of Digital Device Usage
context.additional_context: A course for high school and university students to strengthen foundational telemedicine competencies, with considerations for smartphone-based accessibility

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic operational procedures and ethical guidelines of telemedicine systems.
Learners can design and implement collaboration strategies in telemedicine scenarios based on real-world cases.
Learners can complete projects by applying patient data protection and communication skills in digital environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
